original_title: John Deere Country: Stories About Folks Who Love John Deere
overview: Loyalty to John Deere is passed from generation to generation. During the Great Depression, John Deere gave farmers extra time to pay. Farmers never forgot. See John Deere tractors lovingly restored and proudly driven, and listen to the stories of their admiring owners.
title: John Deere Country: Stories About Folks Who Love John Deere
